0.0.3.name: wordpress/inform-about-content
0.0.3.description:
Plugin which sends emails to us from WordPress, for comments and new posts, except our own comments and posts. You can disable the option in your profile. At default, all user are receiving an email except the author.

Made by Inpsyde · We love WordPress

Have a look at the premium plugins in our market.

Bugs, technical hints or contribute

Please give me feedback, contribute and file technical bugs on GitHub Repo.
